thread.title: Lionel Messi and fiancee Antonella Roccuzzo pick Luis Suarez up from Barcelona Airport as striker heads home from international duty
thread.title_full: Lionel Messi and fiancee Antonella Roccuzzo pick Luis Suarez up from Barcelona Airport as striker heads home from international duty

author: gstonehouse
title: Lionel Messi and fiancee Antonella Roccuzzo pick Luis Suarez up from Barcelona Airport as striker heads home from international duty

organizations.name: antonio conte no joshing manchester united

text:
EFL TAXI FOR LUIS Lionel Messi and fiancee Antonella Roccuzzo pick Luis Suarez up from Barcelona Airport as striker heads home from international duty 
Uruguayan rides in stylefrom his team-mate after landing back from South America By Gary Stonehouse Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments LUIS SUAREZ had a very special chauffeur to pick him up from international duty – none other than Barcelona team-mate Lionel Messi. 
The world’s best footballer and his fiancée Antonella Roccuzzo caused quite the stir when they arrived in their Porsche Cayenne at El Prat airport to collect the Uruguayan forward. as tv 5 Luis Suarez was mobbed by fans as he arrived back in Barcelona… and he had a special driver ready to collect him 
Both the hotshots had been in South America to represent their countries over the past week, but Messi had returned to the Catalan city prior to his strike partner. 
Keep up to date with ALL the FOOTBALL news, gossip, transfers and goals plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
And opting against club car or blacked-out vehicle, Suarez was only too happy to hop in with the Argentina star for the drive home. 
Despite suffering two defeats with his country against Peru and Brazil, the 30-year-old looked to be in good spirits as he made his way through the airport. With his son sitting on the luggage trolley, he stopped numerous times for selfies with numerous fans. 
Messi was waiting for his friend downstairs in an underground car park. 
The bond between the duo has only strengthened on the pitch for Barcelona this season. as tv Barcelona team-mate Lionel Messi was waiting in an underground car park ready to pick up Luis Suarez as tv Lionel Messi and his fiancée Antonella Roccuzzo arrived in their Porsche Cayenne Getty Images Antonella Roccuzzo and Lionel Messi pose for a photo at the Nou Camp along with their son Reuters 5 Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez has netted 47 goals between them for Barcelona in La Liga this season 
They have netted 47 league goals between them, with Messi in first and Suarez in second in the running for the Golden Boot. 
That form has not been good enough to lift Barca into top spot in La Liga. 
They currently trail bitter rivals Real Madrid by two points. Barcelona stars Messi, Suarez and Neymar on business trip to play PSG Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez play insane volley keepie-uppie skills challenge on Japanese TV
